Title: Add/Maintain Region

Test Steps.Step Action: Pre-requirement:\n- Have an existing County\n- Have an existing Town
As a State User navigate to District Management > Districts > Region
Click "ADD"
Enter a Region name into the "Name" field and click "SAVE"
In the Region Assignments section, click "ADD" under the "County" tab
From the "County Name" dropdown, select your existing County
Click "SAVE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: County is assigned to the Region

Test Steps.Step Action: In the Region Assignments section, click on the "Town" tab and then click "ADD"
From the "Town Name" dropdown, select your existing Town
Click "SAVE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: Town is assigned to the Region

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "UPDATE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: Region is successfully updated and the user is taken back to the Region search screen

Test Steps.Step Action: Search for the newly created Region by entering the Region ID or the Region name into the search criteria and clicking "SEARCH"
Test Steps.Step Expected: Newly created Region is displayed in the results list

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the "Actions" ellipsis for the newly created Region
Click on "Edit"
Change the Region name
Click on the "Actions" ellipsis next to the assigned County
Click "Delete"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The County will no longer be assigned to that Region

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the "Town" tab and then click on the "Actions" ellipsis next to the assigned Town
Click "Delete"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Town will no longer be assigned to that Region

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "UPDATE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Region will be updated successfully

Test Steps.Step Action: Search for the newly created Region by entering the Region ID or the new Region name into the search criteria and clicking "SEARCH"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The updated Region is displayed in the results list when will show the newly changed Region name

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the "Actions" ellipsis for the Region
Click "Delete"
Test Steps.Step Expected: A pop-up window will be displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "Ok"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Region will be deleted successfully

Title: Add/Maintain County

Test Steps.Step Action: Pre-conditions:\n- Have an existing Town
Go as a state user to District Management > Districts > County
Click  on the  "ADD" button
Introduce a County name into the "Name"  field
Click on "SAVE"
Click "ADD" under the "Town" tab in the County  Assignments section
Select your existing Town from the "Town Name" dropdown
Test Steps.Step Expected: Town is selected in the "Town Name" dropdown

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on "SAVE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: Town is assigned to the County correctly

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the "UPDATE" button
Test Steps.Step Expected: -County is successfully updated                                                              -User is taken back to the County search page

Test Steps.Step Action: Search for the   created County  by entering the County Name into the search criteria section
Click on "SEARCH"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The created County is displayed in the Grid

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the "Actions" ellipsis for the selected County
Select the "Edit" option
Change the County's name
Click on the "Actions" ellipsis next to the assigned Town
Click on the "Delete" option
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Town is detached to the County

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the "UPDATE" button
Search for the   created County  by entering the County Name into the search criteria section
Click on "SEARCH"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The updated County is displayed in the Grid

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the "Actions" ellipsis for the selected County
Select the "Delete" option
Select the "OK" button
Test Steps.Step Expected: The selected county is deleted succesfully

Title: Add/Maintain Towns

Test Steps.Step Action: Pre-conditions:\n- Have an existing County
Go as a state user to District Management > Districts > Town
Click  on the  "ADD" button
Select your existing County from the "County " dropdown
Test Steps.Step Expected: County is selected in the "County"  dropdown

Test Steps.Step Action: County is selected in the "County"  dropdown
Click on "SAVE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: -Town  is created succesfully                                                       -User is taken back to the Town Search page

Test Steps.Step Action: Search for the   created Town  by entering the Town Name into the search criteria section
Click on "SEARCH"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The created Town  is displayed in the Grid

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the "Actions" ellipsis for the selected Town
Select the "Edit" option
Change the Town's name
Click on the "UPDATE" button
Search for the   created Town  by entering the Town Name into the search criteria section
Click on "SEARCH"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The updated Town  is displayed in the Grid

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the "Actions" ellipsis for the selected Town
Select the "Delete" option
Select the "OK" button
Test Steps.Step Expected: The selected town is deleted succesfully

Title: Add/Maintain Streets/Street Segments

Test Steps.Step Action: Pre-conditions:\n- Be a Region user
Go as a region user to District Management > Districts > Streets
Test Steps.Step Expected: Search Street Segments page is displayed with the Region Dropdown pre-selected

Test Steps.Step Action: Click  on the  "ADD" button
Test Steps.Step Expected: Add Street Segment page is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Fill all the mandatory fields and dropdowns with valid data
Click on "SAVE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: -Street  is created succesfully                                                       -User is taken back to the  Search Street Segments page

Test Steps.Step Action: Search for the   created  Street  by selecting the Street Name in dropdown in the search criteria section
Click on "SEARCH"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The created street will be displayed with a street segment

Test Steps.Step Action: Click  on the  "ADD" button
Test Steps.Step Expected: Add Street Segment page is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Fill all the mandatory fields and dropdowns with valid data
Click on "SAVE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: -Street Segment  is created succesfully                                                       -User is taken back to the  Search Street Segments page

Test Steps.Step Action: Search for the   created  Street  by selecting the Street Name in dropdown in the search criteria section
Click on "SEARCH"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The created street will be displayed with the recently new street segment in  the Grid

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the "Actions" ellipsis for the selected Street Segment
Select the "Edit" option
Test Steps.Step Expected: Add/UpdateStreets and segments page is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Change the data of a field or dropdown(ex:Low Range)
Click on the "UPDATE" button
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Street Segment is updated successfully

Test Steps.Step Action: Search for the   created  Street  by selecting the Street Name in dropdown in the search criteria section
Click on "SEARCH"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The updated Street Segment  is displayed in the Grid

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the "Actions" ellipsis for the selected Street Segment
Select the "View Voters" option
Test Steps.Step Expected: A grid under the selected Street Segment will be displayed with the Voters Information

Test Steps.Step Action: Select the "Back" button
Click on the "Actions" ellipsis for the selected Street Segment
Select the "Delete" option
Select the "OK" button
Test Steps.Step Expected: The selected Street Segment is deleted succesfully

Title: Add/Maintain New Business Address

Test Steps.Step Expected: -Add Business Address is displayed                                        -The criteria is pre-selected by default

Select the "Edit" option
Test Steps.Step Expected: Add/Update Business Address page is displayed

Click on the "UPDATE" button
Click on the "Actions" ellipsis for the selected Business Address
Select the "Delete" option
Select the "OK" button

Title: Add/Maintain New Healthcare Facility

Test Steps.Step Expected: -Add Healthcare Facility is displayed                                        -The criteria selected (Street, Street Segment) is pre-selected

Test Steps.Step Action: Fill all the mandatory fields and dropdowns with valid data
Test Steps.Step Expected: -Healthcare Facility is created succesfully                                                       -User is taken back to the  Search Special Addresses page

Click on the "Actions" ellipsis for the selected  Healthcare Facility
Select the "Edit" option
Test Steps.Step Expected: Add/Update Healthcare Facility  page is displayed

Click on the "UPDATE" button
Click on the "Actions" ellipsis for the updated  Healthcare Facility
Select the "Delete" option
Select the "OK" button

Title: Add/Maintain District

Go as a region user to District Management > Districts > Districts

Test Steps.Step Expected: Add Voting Districts  page is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Fill all the mandatory fields and dropdowns with valid data
Click on "SAVE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: -District  is created succesfully                                                       -User is taken back to the Search Voting Districts page

Click on "SEARCH"

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the "Actions" ellipsis for the selected District
Select the "Edit" option
Test Steps.Step Expected: Update Voting District page is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Change the data of a field or dropdown(ex:Code)

Click on SAVE

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the "UPDATE" button
Test Steps.Step Expected: The District is updated succesfully and all the changes are made

Test Steps.Step Action: Search for the   created  Street  by selecting the  correct criteria (District Type,Name or code) in the search criteria section
Click on "SEARCH"

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the "Actions" ellipsis for the selected District
Select the "Edit" option
Test Steps.Step Expected: Update Voting District page is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the "Actions" ellipsis for the assigned region  in the Voting District Assigments section
Select the "Delete" option
Test Steps.Step Expected: The region assigned is deleted correctly

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the "UPDATE" button
Test Steps.Step Expected: The District is updated succesfully and all the changes are made

Test Steps.Step Action: Search for the   created  Street  by selecting the  correct criteria (District Type,Name or code) in the search criteria section
Click on "SEARCH"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The created District will be displayed in the Grid

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the "Actions" ellipsis for the selected District
Select the "Delete" option
Select the "OK" button
Test Steps.Step Expected: The selected Voting District is deleted succesfully

Title: Validate Assign Voters to a Street and view Voters on that Street

Test Steps.Step Action: -Be a Region User                                                                                                                                                        -Have an existing street segment
Go as a region user to Voter Management > Voter > SEARCH/ADD
Click on the button  "SEARCH"
Select a Voter Search
Click on the three dots in the Actions column
Click on the option "Update"
Fill the "Street name" field with an existing street name in the Residential address section
Select the "SEARCH" button
Test Steps.Step Expected: A window pops up with all the street segments displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Select one street segment by click on the   checkboxes in the Select column
Test Steps.Step Expected: Notice how you can select only one street segment

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the "Select" button
Test Steps.Step Expected: -Notice how the window dissapears                                                -Notice how the street is displayed above the "Street  name" and "SEARCH" button with all the data of the selected street

Test Steps.Step Action: Select the "SUBMIT" button
Test Steps.Step Expected: Notice how the voter is now assignede to the selected street

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the Section Distric Management
Click on the Button STREETS
Select the Street Name *
Test Steps.Step Expected: Search for the street where a voter was assigned to you

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the button SEARCH
Select the street segments added to the voter
Click on the option with three dots\n\n
Click on the View Voters option\n\n
Test Steps.Step Expected: Note that the voters are displayed with the street added

Title: Validate Try to assign a Voter to a Speical Address
Validate Required Fields Warning When Searching for a Street

Test Steps.Step Action: Go as a state user to District Management > Districts
Select the "Streets"
Test Steps.Step Expected: Search Street Segments page is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Select the "SEARCH" button in the Search criteria section without filling the "Region"  and "Street Name" field
Test Steps.Step Expected: Notice how an error message is displayed "Select a region and a street name"

Title: Validate Overlapping Segments Warning When Creating a Street

Test Steps.Step Action: Pre-conditions:\n- Be a Region user                                                                                                                          -Have existing Streets with Street Segments
Go as a region user to District Management > Districts > Streets
Test Steps.Step Expected: Search Street Segments page is displayed with the Region Dropdown pre-selected

Test Steps.Step Action: Search for a Street  by selecting the Street Name in dropdown in the search criteria section
Search for a Street  Segment by selecting the Street Segment in dropdown in the search criteria section
Click on "SEARCH"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The streets are displayed with their segments

Test Steps.Step Action: Click  on the  "ADD" button
Test Steps.Step Expected: Add Street Segment page is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Fill in the corresponding fields with data that overlaps with the previously created ones
Click on "SAVE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: -A validation message is displayed indicating that street segments overlap

Title: Permissions/Restrictions as a State User - Districts

Test Steps.Step Action: Pre-conditions:\n- User is logged in as a State User\nNOTE: (Please refer to the other District Management test cases to fully understand the functionalities mentioned below)
Navigate to District Management > Districts
Check page
Test Steps.Step Expected:
State Users only have access to the following areas:
- Regions
- County
- Town
- Streets
- District Type

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on "Region"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The user has full access to Region functionalities

Test Steps.Step Action: Return to the Districts homepage and click on "County"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The user has full access to County functionalities

Test Steps.Step Action: Return to the Districts homepage and click on "Town"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The user has full access to Town functionalities

Test Steps.Step Action: Return to the Districts homepage and click on "Streets"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The user can search and view all Regions and their Streets but cannot edit them or add new Streets

Test Steps.Step Action: Return to the Districts homepage and click on "District Type"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The user has full access to District Type functionalities

Title: Permissions/Restrictions as a Region User - Districts

Test Steps.Step Action: Pre-conditions:\n- User is logged in as a Region User\nNOTE: (Please refer to the other District Management test cases to fully understand the functionalities mentioned below)
Navigate to District Management > Districts
Check page
Test Steps.Step Expected:
State Users only have access to the following areas:
- County
- Town
- Streets
- Special Address
- District Type
- District
- Precinct

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on "County"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The User can only view and edit Counties that are assigned to the Region they are logged in as

Test Steps.Step Action: Return to the Districts homepage and click on "Town"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The User can only view and edit Towns that are assigned to the County or Region they are logged in to. They can also add new Towns to these existing Counties

Test Steps.Step Action: Return to the Districts homepage and click on "Streets"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The User can only view and edit Streets that are in the Region they are logged in to. They can also add new Steets to that Region

Test Steps.Step Action: Return to the Districts homepage and click on "Special Address"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The User can only view and edit Special Addresses that are in the Region they are logged in to. They can also add new Special Addresses to that Region

Test Steps.Step Action: Return to the Districts homepage and click on "District Type"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The user has full access to District Type functionalities

Test Steps.Step Action: Return to the Districts homepage and click on "District"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The user has full access to District functionalities

Test Steps.Step Action: Return to the Districts homepage and click on "Precinct"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The User can only view and edit Precincts that are in the Region they are logged in to. They can also add new Precincts to that Region

Title: Assign Districts to Region

Test Steps.Step Action:
Pre-conditions:
- Have an existing Region
- Have an existing District
- Be logged in as a Region User for that existing Region
Navigate to District Management > Districts > District
Use the search criteria to find your existing District
Click on the Actions ellipsis next to your existing District
Click "Edit"
Test Steps.Step Expected: Update Voting District page is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on "ADD" under the Regions tab in the Voting District Assignments area
From the Region dropdown, select your existing Region
Click "SAVE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Region is added and the user is taken back to the Update Voting District page

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "UPDATE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The user will receive a success message and the District will be updated successfully with your new Region assignment

Title: View Voting Details when Registering a Voter

Test Steps.Step Action:
Pre-conditions:
- Have an existing Region
- Have an existing voter in that Region
- Have an existing Street/Street Segment in that Region
- Have an existing District
Log in as a Region User
Navigate to District Management > Districts > Precincts
Click "ADD"
Fill in all required fields
Click "SAVE"
In the Precinct Assignments area, click "ADD" under the Street Segments tab
Test Steps.Step Expected: Precinct Street Segment page is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Select the Street name of your existing Street
Select the Street Segment of your existing Street
Click "SAVE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Street Segment will be assigned to the Precinct and the user is taken back to the Precinct page

Test Steps.Step Action: In the Precinct Assignments area, select the "Districts" tab and click "ADD"
Select the District Type of your existing District
Select the District name of your existing District
Click "SAVE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The District will be assigned to the Precinct and the user will be taken back to the Precinct page

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "UPDATE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Precinct will be successfully updated and the user is taken back to the Precinct search page

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to Voter Management > Voter > Search/Add
Enter any First Name, Last Name, and Date of Birth
Click "SEARCH"
Test Steps.Step Expected: Any voters that match these details will be shown, if not a "No results found" message will be displayed. The "ADD" button will now also be enabled

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "ADD"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The user will be taken to Voter Registration page will the previous details pre-filled

Test Steps.Step Action: Fill in all other required fields
Under the Residential Address section, search for your existing street name
Test Steps.Step Expected: A list of results will be displayed and the precinct you created will be shown on your existing Street Segment

Test Steps.Step Action: Select your existing Street Segment
In the "Street No." fields, enter a valid Street number
Click "SUBMIT"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Voting Details area will open up below and display your existing District and Precinct

Test Steps.Step Action: Scroll down to the bottom of the page and click "NEXT"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Review Screen will be displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Scroll down to the Precinct Details Review area
Test Steps.Step Expected: Your existing District and Precinct will be displayed here also

Test Steps.Step Action: Scroll down and select an NVRA Code
Click "REGISTER VOTER"
Check page
Test Steps.Step Expected: Your existing Districts and Precincts will be displayed here too

Title: Add street with multiple Low/High/Overlapping streets and validate

Test Steps.Step Action: Pre-conditions:\n- Be a Region user

Scenario 1:\nAdd street with multiple Low/High:                                                                                                    Go as a region user to District Management > Districts > Streets
Test Steps.Step Expected: Search Street Segments page is displayed with the Region Dropdown pre-selected

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the button "ADD"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The form for \nAdd / Update Streets and Segments

Test Steps.Step Action: Enter data in the required fields
Test Steps.Step Expected:
Required fields:  Street Name*
Street Type*
Side*
Zip Code 5*
Low Range*
High Range*

Test Steps.Step Action: Enter invalid data in the fields\nLow Range*\nHigh Range*
Test Steps.Step Expected:
Enter data:
- numbers odd
- Negative numbers
- Incorrect data

Test Steps.Step Action: Click in the button "SAVE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: - A validation message is displayed indicating :  For an EVEN Side, Low range and High range must be an even number.

Test Steps.Step Action: Scenario 2:\nOverlapping streets:                                                                                               Search for a Street  by selecting the Street Name in dropdown in the search criteria section
Click on "SEARCH"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The streets are displayed with their segments

Test Steps.Step Action: Click  on the  "ADD" button
Test Steps.Step Expected: Add Street Segment page is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Fill in the corresponding fields with data that overlaps with the previously created ones
Click on "SAVE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: -A validation message is displayed indicating that street segments overlap

Title: Add/Maintain Precinct Splits

Test Steps.Step Action:
Pre-conditions:
- Have an existing Region
- Have at least two existing Street/Street Segments in that Region
- Have at least two existing Districts with different District Types
Log in as a Region User
Navigate to District Management > Districts > Precincts
Click "ADD"
Fill in all required fields
Click "SAVE"
In the Precinct Assignments area, click "ADD" under the Street Segments tab
Test Steps.Step Expected: Precinct Street Segment page is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Select the Street name of one of your existing Streets
Select the Street Segment of one of your existing Streets
Click "SAVE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Street Segment will be assigned to the Precinct and the user will be taken back to the Precinct page

Test Steps.Step Action: In the Precinct Assignments area, select the "Districts" tab and click "ADD"
Select the District Type of one of your existing Districts
Select the District name of one of your existing Districts
Click "SAVE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The District will be assigned to the Precinct and the user will be taken back to the Precinct page

Test Steps.Step Action: In the Precinct Assignments area, select the "Precinct Splits" tab and click "CREATE PRECINCT SPLIT"
Test Steps.Step Expected: A confirmation message will be displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "Ok"
Test Steps.Step Expected: Two Precinct Splits will now be created. The first Precinct Split will take the Street Segment and the District that was originally assigned to the parent Precinct. The second Precinct Split will only take the District from the parent Precinct. The User will be taken straight to the second Precinct Split page

Test Steps.Step Action: Check the Name and Code
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Precinct Split name will have the original parent Precinct name with an additional "2/2" added. This will also apply for the Code

Test Steps.Step Action: In the Precinct Split Assignments area, click "ADD" under the Street Segments tab
Test Steps.Step Expected: Precinct Street Segment page is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Select the Street name of one of your other existing Streets
Select the Street Segment of one of your other existing Streets (cannot be the same one you used before)
Click "SAVE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Street Segment will be assigned to the Precinct  Split and the user will be taken back to the Precinct Split page

Test Steps.Step Action: In the Precinct Split Assignments area, select the "Districts" tab
Test Steps.Step Expected: The original District that was assigned to the parent Precinct will be shown here

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "ADD"
Select the District Type of one of your other existing Districts (cannot be the same one you used before)
Select the District name of one of your other existing Districts (cannot be the same one you used before)
Click "SAVE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The District will be assigned to the Precinct Split and the user will be taken back to the Precinct page

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "SAVE" again
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Precinct Spit will be saved and the user will be taken back to the parent Precinct page

Test Steps.Step Action: Check the Street Segments tab
Test Steps.Step Expected: There will no longer be any Street Segments assigned to the parent Precinct and the "ADD" will be gone

Test Steps.Step Action: Check the Districts tab
Test Steps.Step Expected: There will no longer be any Street Segments assigned to the parent Precinct and the "ADD" will be gone

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the "Precincts Splits" tab
Test Steps.Step Expected: Your two Precinct Splits will be displayed here, you can update, delete, or add additional Precinct Splits

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "UPDATE" near the top of the page
Test Steps.Step Expected: The parent Precinct will be updated with it's Precinct Splits and the user is taken back to the Precinct search page

Title: Validate Required Fields Warning When Adding a District Type

Test Steps.Step Action: Go as a state user to District Management > Districts
Select the District Type option
Test Steps.Step Expected: Search District Type page is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Click  on the  "ADD" button
Test Steps.Step Expected: Add District Type page is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Select the "SAVE" button without filling any field
Test Steps.Step Expected: Notice how an error message is displayed "Error: Missing required fields"

Title: Validate Required Fields Warning When Searching for a Special Address

Test Steps.Step Action: Pre-conditions:\n- Have an existing Street with Segments\n-Be a Region User
Go as a state user to District Management > Districts > Special Address
Test Steps.Step Expected: -Search Special Addresses page is displayed with the Region Dropdown pre-selected                                                             -Bussiness Address section is displayed as default

Test Steps.Step Action: Leave the fields in blank In the Search Special Adress section
Select the Search button
Test Steps.Step Expected: Notice how an error message is displayed "Error: Missing required fields"

Title: Validate missing required field  when Adding a Voting District

Test Steps.Step Action: - Be a Region user                                                                                                                                   -Have an existing District Type
Go as a region user to District Management > Districts > Districts
Test Steps.Step Expected: Search Voting Districts page is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Click  on the  "ADD" button
Test Steps.Step Expected: Add Voting Districts  page is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on the "SAVE" button without filling any field
Test Steps.Step Expected: -A validation message is displayed indicating that a required field is missing

Title: Manage Election Precinct

Test Steps.Step Action:
Pre-conditions:
- Have an existing Region
- Have at least 2 existing Precincts in that Region
- Have at least 2 existing Districts assigned to each Precinct
- Have an existing Election
Log into the EMS
Log in as a Region User
Navigate to Election Managment > Elections > Search Election
Use the search criteria to find your existing Election
Click on the Actions ellipsis next to the existing Election
Click "Manage Election Precincts"
Test Steps.Step Expected: Manage Elections Precincts page is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: From the District Type dropdown, select the District Type that your first existing District uses
Test Steps.Step Expected: District Type selected and list of Districts will be updated

Test Steps.Step Action: Find and select your first existing District from the list
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Precinct assigned to that first District will be displayed under the "Precincts in this District" and "Included Election Precincts" list

Test Steps.Step Action: From the District Type dropdown, select the District Type that your second existing District uses
Test Steps.Step Expected: District Type selected and list of Districts will be updated

Test Steps.Step Action: Find and select your second existing District from the list
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Precinct assigned to that second District will be displayed under the "Precincts in this District" and "Included Election Precincts" list

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on "Save"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Districts and Precincts will be successfully assigned to the Election, and the user is taken back to the Election search page

Test Steps.Step Action: Find your existing Election and click on the Actions ellipsis next to it
Click "Manage Election Precincts"
Test Steps.Step Expected: Manage Elections Precincts page is displayed and your assigned District and Precinct will be displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Un-select the second assigned District
Test Steps.Step Expected: The related Precinct will no longer display in the "Precincts in this District" and "Included Election Precincts" list

Test Steps.Step Action: Click on "Save"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The second District and Precinct assignment will be removed and the user is taken to the Election search page

Title: Using Districts to create Offices

Test Steps.Step Action:
Pre-conditions:
- Have an existing Region
- Have an existing District Types in that Region
- Have an existing Districts with the District Types
Log in as a Region User
Navigate to Election Management > Offices > SEARCH OFFICES
Test Steps.Step Expected: Search Office page will be displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "ADD"
Fill in all the mandatory fields
Select the District Type mandatory dropdown
Select a District Type
Select the  District mandatory dropdown
Test Steps.Step Expected: Districts related to the selected District Type are displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Select a District
Click "SAVE"
Search for the newly created Office by entering data  into the search criteria and clicking "SEARCH"
Test Steps.Step Expected: Newly created Office is displayed in the results list

Title: Manage Election Poll Places & Precinct Assignments

Test Steps.Step Action:
Pre-conditions:
- Have an exiting County
- Have an existing Precinct in that County
- Have an existing Poll Place
- Have an existing Election
Log in to the system as a County user
Navigate to Election Managment > Polling Places > Search Polling Place
Test Steps.Step Expected: Search Polling Place page is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Use the search criteria to find your existing Polling Place
Click on the "Actions" ellipsis next to the existing Polling Place
Click "Manage"
Test Steps.Step Expected: Manage Polling Place page is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: Scroll down and select the "Precinct Assignment" tab
Click "ADD/MAINTAIN"
Use the search bar to find your existing Precinct and select it
Test Steps.Step Expected: Your existing Precinct will now be displayed under the "Assigned Precincts" list

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "SAVE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Precinct will be assigned to the Polling Place and the user is taken back to the Manage Polling Place page

Test Steps.Step Action: Navigate to Election Managment > Search Election
Use the search criteria to find your existing Election
Click on the "Actions" ellipsis next to the Election
Click "Manage Election Poll Places & Precinct Assignments"
Test Steps.Step Expected: Manage Election Poll Places & Precinct Assignments page is displayed

Test Steps.Step Action: From the "Poll Type" dropdown, select the Poll Type of your existing Polling Place
Find and select your existing Poll place from the "Poll Places in this Election" list
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Available Precincts will be listed

Test Steps.Step Action: Select your existing Precinct and click on the directional arrow to assign the Precinct
Test Steps.Step Expected: Precinct moved over to the "Precincts Selected" list

Test Steps.Step Action: Click "SAVE"
Test Steps.Step Expected: The Polling Place and Precinct will be assigned to the Election, and the user is taken back to the Election Search page
